title: Which system sounds can be configured on my phone?
answer:
Select or deselect the corresponding check boxes to enable or disable sound effects. 

 Dial pad touch tones: play tone when the dialing keypad is touched. 

 Touch sounds: play sound when you touch the screen. 

 Screen lock sound: play sound when the screen is locked. 

 Vibrate on touch: screen vibrates when you touch the back, home, menu or recent key.
